name: Runnerogue
description:
RUNNEROGUE!

a FAST Action Runner & Roguelite video game

How to play?

Just RUN on the ground, AVOID the spikes and enemies, THROW the knife and BUY items!

Controls

Controls are simple! It's just mouse and keyboards!

Additional Controls

M: Change game difficulty while playing main game (The wave in progress will restarted)

R: Restart the wave in progress

P: Restart the game

CREDITS

programming, art except for ground tiles - R2turnTrue (me) (twitter)

Sources

ground tile - Sunny Land by ansimuz (itch.io asset url)

music - AdhesiveWombat (youtube channel)

the prototype made for Juice Jam II
